marklogic.body:
English Speakers to Help The Syrian Revolution
ZABADANI is under violent shell attack, and the attack on DAEEL: DARAA, anticipated earlier is under way. Heavy gunfire on anything that moves is reported, and more than 20 homes of activists and martyrs have been Burned, with columns of smoke rising above the town. A large number of people have been arrested, and snipers are on roof tops. TAFAS: DARAA: reports heavy gunfire from all the checkpoints JASSEMl DARAA: regime forces Raided the industrial and business school, arrested a number of students, severely beat the teachers and destroyed the school's furniture.
